items.title: Game like simulations with Captivate 9

visible_instructors.job_title: Arquitecto, Coordinador de e-learning en adsum
visible_instructors.title: Roberto O. Verdugo
visible_instructors.name: Roberto O.

items.headline: Immerse your students/ users with game like activities using Captivate and without the need to code.
objectives_summary: At the end of the course, the users will be able to design and build their own simulations using Adobe Illustrator, and Captivate's variables and Advanced actions.
Keep score of an evaluation, adding points to an activity, navigate between different scenarios, show items on a slide depending on what or where a user clics.
